type TraceListener = class inherit MarshalByRefObject interface IDisposable

summary.span: 为监视跟踪和调试输出的侦听器提供 基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for the listeners who monitor trace and debug output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何实现的示例，请参阅，和类。For examples of how to implement a , see the , and the classes. 必须启用跟踪或调试使用跟踪侦听器。You must enable tracing or debugging to use a trace listener. 下面的语法是特定的编译器。The following syntax is compiler specific. 如果使用除 C# 或 Visual Basic 编译器，请参阅您的编译器的文档。If you use compilers other than C# or Visual Basic, refer to the documentation for your compiler. - 若要启用调试 C# 中，添加`/d:DEBUG`到编译器命令行编译代码，也可以添加标志`#define DEBUG`到你的文件的顶部。To enable debugging in C#, add the `/d:DEBUG` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or you can add `#define DEBUG` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，添加`/d:DEBUG=True`到编译器命令行的标志。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:DEBUG=True` flag to the compiler command line. - 若要启用 C# 中的跟踪，请添加`/d:TRACE`到编译器命令行编译代码，或添加时标志`#define TRACE`到你的文件的顶部。To enable tracing in C#, add the `/d:TRACE` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or add `#define TRACE` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，添加`/d:TRACE=True`到编译器命令行的标志。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:TRACE=True` flag to the compiler command line. 若要添加跟踪侦听器，请编辑你的应用程序的名称对应的配置文件。To add a trace listener, edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此文件中，可以添加一个侦听器，将其类型设置和其参数、 删除侦听器，或清除以前由应用程序设置的所有侦听器。Within this file, you can add a listener, set its type and set its parameter, remove a listener, or clear all the listeners previously set by the application. 应类似于下面的示例配置文件进行格式化。The configuration file should be formatted similar to the following example. ```xml ``` 有关使用配置文件进行跟踪的详细信息，请参阅[ <system.diagnostics>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/system-diagnostics-element.md)。For more information on using configuration files for tracing, see [<system.diagnostics>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/system-diagnostics-element.md).

span.span: This type is thread safe.

summary.span: 获取应用程序配置文件中定义的自定义跟踪侦听器特性。

span.span: Gets the custom trace listener attributes defined in the application configuration file.

value.span: 包含自定义跟踪侦听器特性的 。

span.span: A containing the custom attributes for the trace listener.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 继承的类类可以通过重写中添加自定义特性方法并返回自定义属性名称的字符串数组。Classes that inherit from the class can add custom attributes by overriding the method and returning a string array of custom attribute names. 属性标识应用程序的配置文件中引用的自定义特性。The property identifies the custom attributes that are referenced in the application's configuration file. 例如，在下面的配置文件摘录引用自定义特性"分隔符"。For example, in the following configuration file excerpt the custom attribute "delimiter" is referenced. 在这种情况下，属性返回包含字符串"分隔符"。In this case, the property returns a containing the string "delimiter". ```xml ``` 未引用的自定义特性不会枚举。Unreferenced custom attributes are not enumerated. 有关更多信息，请参见 方法。For more information, see the method.

summary.span: 在派生类中被重写时，关闭输出流以使它不再接收跟踪或调试输出。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, closes the output stream so it no longer receives tracing or debugging output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法时输出将一个文件，如到。Use this method when the output is going to a file, such as to the . 此方法调用后, 必须重新初始化该对象。After a call to this method, you must reinitialize the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用允许使用的资源重新分配用于其他目的。Calling allows the resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共方法和方法。This method is called by the public method and the method. `Dispose` 调用受保护方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写此方法时, 请小心不要引用已经释放的早期调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding this method, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息并，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).
Implementing a Dispose method

summary.span: 获取并设置跟踪侦听器的跟踪筛选器。

span.span: Gets and sets the trace filter for the trace listener.

value.span: 一个派生自 基类的对象。

span.span: An object derived from the base class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将跟踪筛选器添加到跟踪侦听器以提供屏蔽所没有的跟踪源提供的交换机的层。A trace filter can be added to a trace listener to provide a layer of screening beyond that provided to the trace source by switches. 例如，可以添加到跟踪侦听器来控制输出的事件类型侦听器。For example, the can be added to a trace listener to control the event types that are output by the listener. 因为满足交换机条件调用的侦听器可以查询其筛选器，如果存在，以确定是否要发送到输出。Listeners that are called because the switch criteria are met can query their filter, if present, to determine if a trace is to be sent to output. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性将源筛选器添加到控制台跟踪侦听器。The following code example shows how to use the property to add a source filter to a console trace listener. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#28](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/CS/program.cs#28)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#28](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/VB/program.vb#28)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示跟踪侦听器是否是线程安全的。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the trace listener is thread safe.

value.span: 如果跟踪侦听器是线程安全的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the trace listener is thread safe; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值用于确定是否写入侦听器时使用全局锁。The value of is used to determine whether to use a global lock when writing to the listener. 如果的值是`false`，而不考虑的值使用全局锁。If the value of is `false`, the global lock is used regardless of the value of . 仅当不使用全局锁的值是`true`的值是`false`。The global lock is not used only if the value of is `true` and the value of is `false`. 默认行为是使用全局锁定时写入到侦听器。The default behavior is to use the global lock whenever writing to the listener.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **请注意**调用的方法并类集属性值设置为`false`以更高版本，防止不必要的缩进。**Note** The method, called by the and classes, sets the property value to `false` to prevent later, unnecessary indents. 必须设置属性设置为`true`每当你想要缩进跟踪输出。You must set the property to `true` each time you wish to indent trace output.

summary.span: 向特定于侦听器的输出中写入跟踪信息、数据对象和事件信息。

span.span: Writes trace information, a data object and event information to the listener specific output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法不应直接由应用程序代码，但成员调用， ，和类编写要输出的跟踪数据。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code but by members of the , , and classes to write trace data to output. 默认实现写入`eventCache`， `source`，`eventType`和`id`标头和跟踪页脚中的参数。The default implementation writes the `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType` and `id` parameters in the header and footer of the trace. `data`参数编写为跟踪消息的正文。The `data` parameter is written as the body of the trace message. `ToString`的数据对象的方法用于将对象转换为。The `ToString` method of the data object is used to convert the object to a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法不应直接由应用程序代码，但成员调用， ，和类编写要输出的跟踪数据。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code but by members of the , , and classes to write trace data to output. 默认实现将的值写入`source`，`eventType`和`id`参数作为标头。The default implementation writes the values of the `source`, `eventType` and `id` parameters as a header. 数据对象将转换为字符串使用`ToString`的每个对象的方法。The data objects are converted to strings using the `ToString` method of each object. `eventCache`将数据写为页脚，依赖于的值的输出数据的性质属性。The `eventCache` data is written as a footer, the nature of the output data being dependent on the value of the property.

summary.span: 向特定于侦听器的输出写入跟踪和事件信息。

span.span: Writes trace and event information to the listener specific output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法不应直接由应用程序代码，但成员调用， ，和类编写要输出的跟踪数据。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code but by members of the , , and classes to write trace data to output. 默认实现将的值写入`source`，`eventType`和`id`参数作为标头。The default implementation writes the values of the `source`, `eventType` and `id` parameters as a header. `args`对象数组转换为字符串使用方法，传递`format`字符串和`args`要跟踪的消息部分作为格式字符串数组。The `args` object array is converted to a string using the method, passing the `format` string and `args` array to format the string as the message portion of the trace. `eventCache`将数据写为页脚，依赖于的值的输出数据的性质属性。The `eventCache` data is written as a footer, the nature of the output data being dependent on the value of the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置跟踪输出选项。

span.span: Gets or sets the trace output options.
A bitwise combination of the enumeration values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定可选跟踪输出的内容。The property determines the optional content of trace output. 该属性可以设置配置文件中或以编程方式在执行过程包括专门的代码部分的其他数据。The property can be set in the configuration file or programmatically during execution to include additional data specifically for a section of code. 例如，可以设置属性的控制台跟踪侦听器，以便将调用堆栈信息添加到跟踪输出。For example, you can set the property for the console trace listener to to add call stack information to the trace output. 枚举未由以下类和方法：The enumeration is not used by the following classes and methods: - 类，因为它可能会导致大量的数据写入到日志。The class, because it can cause a large volume of data to be written to the log. - `Write`并`WriteLine`方法的， ，和类。The `Write` and `WriteLine` methods of the , , and classes. - 并方法的类时它们不在派生类中重写。The and methods of the class when they are not overridden in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的设置控制台跟踪侦听器的属性。The following example shows the setting of the property for a console trace listener. 控制台跟踪侦听器是一个枚举中的侦听器跟踪源的属性。The console trace listener is one of the listeners enumerated in the property of a trace source. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/CS/program.cs#16)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/VB/program.vb#16)]

exception.span: Set 操作失败，因为值无效。

span.span: Set operation failed because the value is invalid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法不应直接由应用程序代码，但成员调用， ，和类编写要输出的跟踪数据。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code but by members of the , , and classes to write trace data to output. 方法是否用于关联相关的跟踪。The method is used for the correlation of related traces. 方法调用方法来处理调用时，事件类型级别设置为并且`relatedActivityId`作为字符串附加到邮件中。The method calls the method to process the call, with the eventType level set to and the `relatedActivityId` as a string appended to the message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法写入缩进，并将重置属性设置为`false`。This method writes the indent and resets the property to `false`. 如果调用此方法是`true`当你将重写和方法。Call this method if is `true` when you are overriding the and methods. 默认情况下，此方法使用缩进的空格。By default, this method uses blank spaces for indentation. 缩进的大小由值决定和属性。The size of the indent is determined by the values of the and properties. 属性表示的时间量由指定的大小的缩进应用属性。The property represents the number of times the indent of the size specified by the property is applied. 调用此方法和类。This method is called by the and classes.
